name: Muddledash Soundtrack
short_description: Squidge up to four players on your couch for competitive fun (party hats are mandatory!) Join your friends on a mad-as-a-squid race to the most bopping octopus party of the year and wrestle the only present out of their wriggly tentacles. Be the first to present it at the octo-party to win!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Ukrainian
